 Â Terror. Violence. Madness. Bedlam. A holiday paradise gone mad. A tropical
 Â island turns into total chaos after a mysterious zombie outbreak. Cut off
 Â from the rest of the world, the player's only chance to survive is to fight
 Â to the death and find a way to escape from the island.

 Â Dead Island combines first-person action with a heavy focus on melee combat,
 Â character development and customization of a vast array of weapons. All of
 Â these gameplay features are presented in a dark story inspired by classic
 Â zombie movies with a gritty and engrossing campaign that can be played with
 Â up to four players in co-op mode.

 Â Set in an open world tropical island, hordes of different festering zombies
 Â await players around every corner while they embark on a variety of
 Â thrilling missions through the holiday resort. With firearms and ammunition
 Â being scarce the player must rely on utilizing found items as weapons for
 Â self-defense and fight off zombie hordes in intense melee combat. A diverse
 Â range of items can be collected and will later serve to transform the
 Â player's ordinary makeshift weapons into serious instruments of destruction.

 Â In addition to satisfying even the most bloodthirsty action fan's fantasy,
 Â Dead Island also features role-playing elements which allow the player to
 Â develop one of the game's unique character classes according to their
 Â preferences, all the while learning new skills and fresh tactics during
 Â their journey through the perilous environments of the island. What's more,
 Â anytime during a game up to four players can seamlessly join together and
 Â experience the intense combat and immersive story with cooperative gameplay.

 Â With the all-new Chrome Engine 5 powering Dead Island, the game will use the
 Â latest installment of Techland's acclaimed proprietary game engine, allowing
 Â the player to experience the tropical island paradise in graphical splendor
 Â with diverse environments like lush forests and detailed city environments.
